DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine protein supplementation , without exercise , affect functional capacity , strength , body composition , physical activity hemodialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Resistance Exercise Protein Supplementation Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: On hemodialysis 3 month , thrice weekly hemodialysis program ; Adequately dialyze ( Kt/V ≥ 1.2 ) . Age ≥ 18 year old . Patients unable perform exercise due cardiovascular disease , osteoarthritis , etc. , determine PI primary physician subject . Pregnant woman . Patients hospitalize within last month prior study .
